description:
The Fleece Light Grid line for women is tailored to the needs of mountaineers who require good ventilation and scuff protection but minimum weight.

Thanks to the channel structure on the inside, Ortovox's Fleece Light Grid Jacket is particularly light while offering plenty of insulation in chilly temperatures. The fine Tasmanian merino wool lining is very comfortable and will regulate moisture and temperature.

The ergonomic fit of the Fleece Light Grid Jacket provides freedom of movement when you’re on the mountain, while reinforced inserts at the shoulders and elbows offer plenty of scuff protection during demanding climbs. The higher collar helps protect against wind and sun. The large zip opening makes putting the hoody on and off quick and easy, even if you’re wearing a helmet. There’s a small map pocket on the chest so that you’ll always have your orientation at hand.
name: Ortovox Fleece Light Grid Jacket - Mens
